name: Athena - Community Healing Protocol
description: User-centered AI system that helps divided communities rebuild trust and heal social divisions through carefully designed interactions, shared problem-solving, and restorative justice approaches that prioritize human dignity and cultural sensitivity

steps.name: Generate Community Listening and Understanding System
steps.prompt: Create a community-centered listening system using AGNO framework that helps understand the root causes of social divisions. Build CommunityListenerAgent that conducts respectful interviews with community members from all sides of conflicts, CulturalSensitivityAgent that ensures approaches respect diverse backgrounds and traditions, and StorytellingAgent that helps people share their experiences and perspectives in safe, structured ways. Include a platform where community members can anonymously share their concerns, fears, and hopes for healing. The system must prioritize human dignity, cultural humility, and genuine understanding over quick fixes. Create safe spaces for vulnerable voices and marginalized community members.

objective.task: Create comprehensive trust-building infrastructure that ensures all community members feel safe, heard, and respected throughout the healing process.
constraints: Implement SafeSpaceAgent that creates physically and emotionally secure environments for community dialogue
Create AnonymityProtectionAgent that protects participant identities while enabling authentic sharing
Build TraumaInformedAgent that recognizes and responds appropriately to community trauma and historical wounds
Add NeutralFacilitationAgent that ensures fair representation and prevents dominant voices from silencing others
Integrate TrustFoundationTeam that coordinates all safety agents with community consent and cultural protocols
Include community-controlled moderation where local leaders help set guidelines and boundaries
Add restorative justice principles that focus on healing rather than punishment or blame
Implement indigenous and traditional conflict resolution practices with community elder guidance

objective.task: Build intelligent dialogue facilitation that helps opposing community groups understand each other's perspectives and find common ground.
constraints: Implement DialogueFacilitatorAgent that guides respectful conversations between conflicted parties
Create EmpathyBridgeAgent that helps participants understand experiences different from their own
Build CommonGroundAgent that identifies shared values, concerns, and goals across community divisions
Add ConflictTransformationAgent that reframes adversarial dynamics into collaborative problem-solving
Integrate CommunityDialogueTeam that coordinates all mediation agents with local cultural wisdom
Include structured storytelling sessions where people share personal impacts of community conflicts
Add perspective-taking exercises that help participants see situations through others' eyes
Implement circle processes and other community-based healing traditions with proper cultural respect

objective.task: Create systems that channel community energy toward solving shared challenges rather than perpetuating divisions.
constraints: Create CommunityNeedsAgent that identifies practical problems affecting all community members
Implement CollaborativeDesignAgent that facilitates joint problem-solving across community divisions
Build ResourceMobilizationAgent that helps communities organize collective action for shared goals
Add SuccessAmplificationAgent that celebrates collaborative achievements and positive community changes
Integrate ProblemSolvingTeam that coordinates all collaboration agents with community ownership priority
Include project-based healing where former opponents work together on community improvement initiatives
Add skill-sharing programs that connect people across divides through mutual teaching and learning
Implement community asset mapping that highlights existing strengths and resources for collective building

objective.task: Create systems that support the development of new, positive relationships across former community divisions.
constraints: Implement RelationshipBuildingAgent that facilitates meaningful connections between previously opposed community members
Create MentorshipAgent that pairs community members for mutual support and understanding across divisions
Build ForgivenessProcessAgent that supports those ready to engage in forgiveness and reconciliation processes
Add YouthEngagementAgent that involves younger community members in shaping a more unified future
Integrate HealingNetworkTeam that coordinates all relationship agents with intergenerational wisdom
Include family and friend integration programs that extend healing beyond individual participants
Add community ritual and ceremony design that marks progress and celebrates healing milestones
Implement peer support networks where community members mentor others through their own healing journeys

steps.name: Create Progress Monitoring and Adaptation System

objective.task: Build community-controlled systems for tracking healing progress and adapting approaches based on community feedback and changing needs.
constraints: Implement CommunityFeedbackAgent that continuously gathers input from all community segments on healing effectiveness
Create ProgressIndicatorAgent that tracks meaningful metrics of social cohesion and reduced conflict
Build AdaptationAgent that adjusts healing approaches based on community input and changing circumstances
Add TransparencyAgent that keeps the community informed about progress, challenges, and next steps
Integrate ProgressMonitoringTeam that coordinates all tracking agents with community accountability
Include community-defined success metrics that reflect local values and priorities
Add regular community assemblies where progress is reviewed and approaches are democratically adjusted
Implement early warning systems that detect potential setbacks and trigger additional support

objective.task: Create governance systems that prevent future conflicts and maintain healing progress through community-controlled decision-making processes.
constraints: Create ConflictPreventionAgent that identifies potential future divisions before they escalate
Implement InclusiveDecisionAgent that ensures all community voices are heard in future governance
Build AccountabilityAgent that maintains transparency and prevents abuse of power in community leadership
Add CivicEngagementAgent that increases community participation in local decision-making processes
Integrate SustainableGovernanceTeam that coordinates all governance agents with democratic principles
Include community constitution development that codifies agreed-upon values and conflict resolution processes
Add leadership development programs that prepare diverse community members for inclusive governance roles
Implement participatory budgeting and community-controlled resource allocation systems

steps.name: Build Legacy and Knowledge Transfer Platform

objective.task: Create systems that preserve healing knowledge and support other communities facing similar divisions.
constraints: Implement KnowledgePreservationAgent that documents healing processes and lessons learned for community archives
Create MentorCommunityAgent that enables healed communities to support others beginning their healing journeys
Build WisdomSharingAgent that facilitates knowledge transfer while respecting community privacy and autonomy
Add NextGenerationAgent that ensures younger community members learn from healing experiences and can maintain progress
Integrate LegacyBuildingTeam that coordinates all knowledge agents with community consent and ownership
Include community storytelling archives that preserve healing narratives for future generations
Add inter-community learning networks where different communities share healing strategies and support
Implement research and documentation systems that contribute to global understanding of community healing

steps.name: Create Ethical Framework and Professional Integration

objective.task: Build professional integration with conflict resolution specialists while maintaining community autonomy and ethical standards.
constraints: Implement EthicalOversightAgent that ensures all healing approaches meet professional mediation and restorative justice standards
Create ProfessionalCollaborationAgent that connects communities with trained conflict resolution specialists when needed
Build CommunityAutonomyAgent that ensures outside professional help respects community self-determination
Add CulturalCompetencyAgent that maintains cultural sensitivity and prevents colonial or paternalistic approaches
Integrate EthicalFrameworkTeam that coordinates all professional agents with community sovereignty priority
Include training programs for local mediators and peacebuilders within the community
Add connection to international peace-building networks and conflict transformation resources
Implement ethical review processes that prevent exploitation and ensure community benefit from any research or documentation
